tooltip: Select King Darunia, Sage of Fire, as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Darunia focuses on improving the armor of many Goron units.
Allows you to summon Darunia, a powerful Melee warrior carrying a hammer and fire attacks.
